- [x] Install Required Extensions

- [x] Compile the Project
  Project structure created. To compile, users need:
  - Android SDK installed
  - ANDROID_HOME environment variable set
  - Run: gradlew.bat build

- [x] Create and Run Task
  Android projects use Gradle for building. Users can run Gradle tasks directly via terminal.

- [x] Launch the Project
  To run the app:
  1. Set up Android Emulator or connect physical device
  2. Run: gradlew.bat installDebug
  3. App will launch on device/emulator
